verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluia
Alleluia
For the Lord God Almighty reigns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Alleluia
Holy, Holy are You Lord God Almighty
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are holy
Holy are you Lord God Almighty
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb
